comments.body:
Does err need to be passed in as an argument at all here? It seems to be immediately overwritten by `nodeInfo.VSphere.CreateVolume(...)`.

cc @hoegaarden
error is as a  return value , I think no need to do anything

I agree with tanshanshan here.
That seems we forgot to remove the Expect(err) in https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/commit/c0490fa62365a37d1a4c3c27b746822782849fc2#diff-0714d41e8eaadd3eb93bba91a7347782R114

diffHunk:

	By("creating vmdk")
	volumePath = ""
